subject: Inquiry About My Order from August 16, 2025 (No Shipping Confirmation Yet)
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,
 I placed an order for a pedal 6 days ago, on August 16, 2025 (Order Number: SSN2384). I saw on your website that production usually takes 1–2 days, but I haven’t received a shipping confirmation yet. 
 Could you please let me know if my order is still in production or if there has been any issue? I’d appreciate a quick update on the current status. 
 Thank you in advance for your support. 
 Best regards, Fabian Zagler

conversations.body_text: Hello, we apologise for the delay. Last week, we were waiting for the German warehouse to replenish its stock before shipping your order to avoid taxes, but the goods were delayed and are now expected to arrive on Tuesday this week.

Dear Simsonn Team,

Thank you for your replay earlier this week regarding my 
order #SSN2384. You mentioned that the stock would arrive
At your German warehouse on Tuesday this week and that my
order would be shipped right after. 

As of today (Friday), I still haven’t received any shipping 
confirmation or tracking information. Could you please provide 
me with an update on the current status of my order?

Thank you in advance for your support. 

Best regards,
Fabian Zagler

Am 25.08.25 um 05:19 schrieb service@simsonn.com

Hello, we apologise for the delay. Last week, we were waiting for the German warehouse to replenish its stock before shipping your order to avoid taxes, but the goods were delayed and are now expected to arrive on Tuesday this week.
Hi Fabian Zagler, we dispatched your order from our German warehouse yesterday. The tracking number has not yet been updated. We apologise for the delay caused.
